channel.title: Will appreciate help!
channel.description:
Hello everyone! I'm just looking for some help here. Please post me your replies.
1- Why is it everytime I type in an NPC code and fight with the monster, it dies without any fight? I just whack it once, and then it dies, without even a hit bubble appearing on it.
2- Why is it everytime I equip a cape, it disconnects me?

item.title: Will appreciate help!
